snippet: The investment bank said on Tuesday that it earned about $71.6 million in profit for the fourth quarter, up 48 percent from the same time a year ago as its core businesses showed marked improvement.
abstract: The investment bank said on Tuesday that it earned about $71.6 million in profit for the fourth quarter, up 48 percent from the same time a year ago as its core businesses showed marked improvement.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Jefferies Posts $71.6 Million Profit in 4th Quarter
